principal.descripcion: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
principal.biografia: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.
principal.mensajecontacto: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

educacion.descripcion: Describe your experience at school, what you learned, what useful skills you have acquired etc.

trabajo.descripcion: Describe work, special projects, notable achievements, what technologies you have been working with, and anything else that would be useful for an employer to know.

proyectos.categoria: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels

testimonios.texto: Un hombre que se atreve a perder una hora no ha descubierto el valor de la vida
Dos cosas son infinitas: el universo y la estupidez humana. Y no estoy seguro sobre la primera
